participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often seeks solitude to recharge and reflect.
participant_1.background: I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team. I'm 5'8", but my dog is only 20 inches tall. I am feeling lost and confused about my future. I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself. I'm the creative one in my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Handy and adventurous, loves to explore new hobbies and share his creations.
participant_2.background: I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it. I like to build things. My favorite band is the Avert Brothers. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Good, I'm just building a little birdhouse in my spare time.
Oh that sounds fun! What are you building it out of?
Mostly scrap wood, but it's coming along nicely.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're enjoying yourself.
Yeah, I'm really into building things right now.
What other things have you built?
Oh, I've built a few things. I made a little table for my dog, and I've also built a few birdhouses.
Wow, that's impressive! I'm sure your dog loves his new table.
Yeah, he really does. He sleeps on it all the time.
That's so cute! Well, I have to get going, but it was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good day!
